description:
This dashboard is one of major topic for Kubernetes Book 
and best optimized for virtual machine environment provided with 
https://github.com/sysnet4admin/_Book_k8sInfra

Notice: It may be running on the other environment but cannot be guaranteed.

targets.expr:
((node_memory_MemTotal_bytes  + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info) - (node_memory_MemAvailable_bytes  + on(instance) group_left(nodename) 
node_uname_info))

title: multi-cluster-test
